attributes.action: encourage the installation of calmer lighting on public transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The lighting on public transport, especially the London underground trains seems very bright and harsh. This adds to the stress and unfriendly nature of travelling on the tube, busses and trains.
Installing calmer lighting will reduce stress, making workers more productive, possibly reduce aggressive crimes and encourage public transport use.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
